data.text:
On a day off, while I was out shopping, I happened to see Tamamo 
Cross. She was just standing there, spacing out.
data.processed:
󠁿On a day off, while I was out shopping, I happened to see Tamamo 
󠁿Cross. She was just standing there, spacing out.

data.text: !! T-t-t-…Traineeeeer!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿!! T-t-t-…Traineeeeer!!

data.text:
Yer here! Yer reeeeally here, thanks!! 
I've reeeeeally been hopin' you'd show up!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Yer here! Yer reeeeally here, thanks!! 
󠁿I've reeeeeally been hopin' you'd show up!!

data.text:
Tha's fine! Ya see, 
I'm jus' really strugglin' with this on my own!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Tha's fine! Ya see, 
󠁿I'm jus' really strugglin' with this on my own!

data.text:
Ya see, I've never been in one 'a these fancy stores ta buy 
anything before, right? I don' even know where ta enter, and th' 
sun'll be settin' by the time I do!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Ya see, I've never been in one 'a these fancy stores ta buy 
󠁿anything before, right? I don' even know where ta enter, and th' 
󠁿sun'll be settin' by the time I do!

data.text:
I beg of ya! Can ya help me find a present 
fer my parents' weddin' anniversary?!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿I beg of ya! Can ya help me find a present 
󠁿fer my parents' weddin' anniversary?!

data.text:
-and, it sounds like th' brats are gonna make some okonomiyaki ta 
celebrate. Since I can't help 'em, I thought it'd be better ta 
buy somethin' and send it.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿-and, it sounds like th' brats are gonna make some okonomiyaki ta 
󠁿celebrate. Since I can't help 'em, I thought it'd be better ta 
󠁿buy somethin' and send it.

data.text:
With my budget, I can't really send 'em anything 
too pricey but… got any good ideas?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿With my budget, I can't really send 'em anything 
󠁿too pricey but… got any good ideas?

data.text:
She just said something about this being fancy but, 
these stores were normally reasonable for a student's 
budget. If that's expensive to her-

choices.text: How about some really good snacks?
How about some really good snacks?

data.processed:
󠁿She just said something about this being fancy but, 
󠁿these stores were normally reasonable for a student's 
󠁿budget. If that's expensive to her-

data.text:
There are plenty of snacks that are low budget but look 
extravagant. They tend to be happily given away at gift 
exchanges, so maybe it'll feel a bit celebratory.
data.processed:
󠁿There are plenty of snacks that are low budget but look 
󠁿extravagant. They tend to be happily given away at gift 
󠁿exchanges, so maybe it'll feel a bit celebratory.

data.text:
Looks fancy but is a decent price? Sounds great! And if it's 
snacks, th' brats can enjoy 'em too… Yeah, let's do that!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Looks fancy but is a decent price? Sounds great! And if it's 
󠁿snacks, th' brats can enjoy 'em too… Yeah, let's do that!

data.text: And with that, we ended up in a place that sells sweets, but-
data.processed: 󠁿And with that, we ended up in a place that sells sweets, but-

data.text: N-no way… isn't tha' one digit too many…?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿N-no way… isn't tha' one digit too many…?

data.text:
Wha-… this… this 1 piece costs 
more than 5 boxes of chocolate!?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Wha-… this… this 1 piece costs 
󠁿more than 5 boxes of chocolate!?

data.text: One month's worth of allowance, gone in one bite… tha's insane!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿One month's worth of allowance, gone in one bite… tha's insane!

data.text:
Unbelievable… inconceivable… 
do people normally eat somethin' this expensive…?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Unbelievable… inconceivable… 
󠁿do people normally eat somethin' this expensive…?

data.text:
I explain that they're normally used as gifts and 
not something for everyday. High-class sweets are 
special, so maybe as a way to reward yourself.
data.processed:
󠁿I explain that they're normally used as gifts and 
󠁿not something for everyday. High-class sweets are 
󠁿special, so maybe as a way to reward yourself.

data.text: A reward fer yerself…?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿A reward fer yerself…?

data.text:
I've heard 'bout tha' before, but people actually do that? 
Eh, isn't tha' wasteful? They don't save it? So weird…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿I've heard 'bout tha' before, but people actually do that? 
󠁿Eh, isn't tha' wasteful? They don't save it? So weird…

data.text:
But, really, this price… 
now I seriously have no idea what ta get…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿But, really, this price… 
󠁿now I seriously have no idea what ta get…

data.text: …yeah. I wanna calm down a bit an' think about it.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿…yeah. I wanna calm down a bit an' think about it.

data.text:
Fuuuuuu… I can finally take a breather. 
Okay, what should I order~.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Fuuuuuu… I can finally take a breather. 
󠁿Okay, what should I order~.

data.text:
…pancakes are THIS much?! 
I still need ta buy a present, so I'd rather spend it on that.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…pancakes are THIS much?! 
󠁿I still need ta buy a present, so I'd rather spend it on that.

data.text: Ah-, I'm fine with jus' water! I'm not tha' hungry anyways~.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Ah-, I'm fine with jus' water! I'm not tha' hungry anyways~.

data.text: Pardon me. Have you decided on your order?
data.name: Cafe Employee
data.processed: 󠁿Pardon me. Have you decided on your order?

data.text: Two orders of pancakes and juice. Certainly.
data.name: Cafe Employee
data.processed: 󠁿Two orders of pancakes and juice. Certainly.

data.text: Wait! Why are ya orderin' for me?!
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: A reward for you and me
A reward for you and me

data.processed: 󠁿Wait! Why are ya orderin' for me?!

data.text:
Tamamo Cross and I have been working hard day in and day out. 
I tell her they're a reward for me too, and she should join me.
data.processed:
󠁿Tamamo Cross and I have been working hard day in and day out. 
󠁿I tell her they're a reward for me too, and she should join me.

data.text:
Besides, it's not just for this spring. Hopefully she'll eat this 
and get the motiviation to work even harder moving forward.
data.processed:
󠁿Besides, it's not just for this spring. Hopefully she'll eat this 
󠁿and get the motiviation to work even harder moving forward.

data.text:
…I can guess what yer thinkin'. 
Ya want me ta try out this "rewardin' yerself" thing fer myself.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…I can guess what yer thinkin'. 
󠁿Ya want me ta try out this "rewardin' yerself" thing fer myself.

data.text:
Since I can't really grasp what rewardin' yerself means… 
I ain't gotta reason ta refuse then. I'll try it fer myself!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Since I can't really grasp what rewardin' yerself means… 
󠁿I ain't gotta reason ta refuse then. I'll try it fer myself!

data.text:
Fuu Fuu Fuu… gettin' ta enjoy such expensive 
pancakes for free, today's my lucky day!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Fuu Fuu Fuu… gettin' ta enjoy such expensive 
󠁿pancakes for free, today's my lucky day!

data.text:
Sorry for the wait, pancakes and juice. 
Please take your time~.
data.name: Cafe Employee
data.processed:
󠁿Sorry for the wait, pancakes and juice. 
󠁿Please take your time~.

data.text:
Oh, it's here!…it's really fluffy isn't it? 
So how is it…?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, it's here!…it's really fluffy isn't it? 
󠁿So how is it…?

data.text: …Fuaa!?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿…Fuaa!?

data.text:
(The moment I put it in my mouth, it melted an' 
th' flavor of eggs spread all through my mouth… 
and it was gone in an instant…)
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿(The moment I put it in my mouth, it melted an' 
󠁿th' flavor of eggs spread all through my mouth… 
󠁿and it was gone in an instant…)

data.text:
(The salty taste of th' butter goes real well 
with th' cream… and such a light aftertaste… 
I could eat these foreeeeeever…!)
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿(The salty taste of th' butter goes real well 
󠁿with th' cream… and such a light aftertaste… 
󠁿I could eat these foreeeeeever…!)

data.text: SOOOO GOOD!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿SOOOO GOOD!!

data.text: Trainer, these… are amazin'!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer, these… are amazin'!!

data.text:
…fer sure, I'd want ta eat this again. I think I see why ya'd 
want ta stretch yer budget for somethin' like this!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…fer sure, I'd want ta eat this again. I think I see why ya'd 
󠁿want ta stretch yer budget for somethin' like this!

data.text: …so tha's why it's called "rewardin' yerself"…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿…so tha's why it's called "rewardin' yerself"…

data.text:
…But, I want my family to eat somethin' like this too. 
I want ta reward my parents and th' brats, too.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: I'm sure they feel the same way

data.processed:
󠁿…But, I want my family to eat somethin' like this too. 
󠁿I want ta reward my parents and th' brats, too.

data.text:
Tamamo Cross' family, probably want to treat her 
to something tasty like this too, feeling like 
it would be a reward for working so hard.
data.processed:
󠁿Tamamo Cross' family, probably want to treat her 
󠁿to something tasty like this too, feeling like 
󠁿it would be a reward for working so hard.

data.text:
My family wanting ta reward me… 
…now that I think about it-
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿My family wanting ta reward me… 
󠁿…now that I think about it-

data.text: Ah-! Neene is the only one with 1 extra croquette! Why-?
data.name: Tamamo's Little Brother
data.processed: 󠁿Ah-! Neene is the only one with 1 extra croquette! Why-?

data.text:
Tha's Tama's reward! 'Cuz she won first place! 
Tama, eat up so ya can run well in th' next one too!
data.name: Tamamo Cross' Father
data.processed:
󠁿Tha's Tama's reward! 'Cuz she won first place! 
󠁿Tama, eat up so ya can run well in th' next one too!

data.text: Tha's right… I've gotten rewarded before…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Tha's right… I've gotten rewarded before…

data.text:
My family and me feel th' same… it's so obvious ain't it? 
Not good… I was gettin' tunnel vision again…
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: Every now and then, how about spoiling yourself?
choices.processed: <size=33>Every now and then, how about spoiling yourself?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿My family and me feel th' same… it's so obvious ain't it? 
󠁿Not good… I was gettin' tunnel vision again…

data.text: …I've been spoiled more than enough… but I'll think about it.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿…I've been spoiled more than enough… but I'll think about it.

data.text:
…well then. Gonna have some more of these pancakes! 
Don't wanna leave any leftovers of somethin' this tasty!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…well then. Gonna have some more of these pancakes! 
󠁿Don't wanna leave any leftovers of somethin' this tasty!

data.text:
After saying that, Tamamo Cross continued stuffing 
herself with the pancakes with surprising vigor, 
saying how tasty it was the whole time.
data.processed:
󠁿After saying that, Tamamo Cross continued stuffing 
󠁿herself with the pancakes with surprising vigor, 
󠁿saying how tasty it was the whole time.

data.text:
I wanna finish it!! I wanna savor it! 
But, my limit… my limit is already approachin'…!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿I wanna finish it!! I wanna savor it! 
󠁿But, my limit… my limit is already approachin'…!

data.text:
…I think I'm cappin' out on this unfamiliar luxury… 
now, my back is covered in cold sweat… I'm feelin' faint…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…I think I'm cappin' out on this unfamiliar luxury… 
󠁿now, my back is covered in cold sweat… I'm feelin' faint…

data.text:
-I never thought her tolerance for high-class food 
would be this low. But, even while in a cold sweat, 
she continued to stuff her mouth with pancake.
data.processed:
󠁿-I never thought her tolerance for high-class food 
󠁿would be this low. But, even while in a cold sweat, 
󠁿she continued to stuff her mouth with pancake.
